plot: Eva decides to do whatever she can to lift up the spirits of the master of the castle, Sir Remy, who is haunted by the death of his wife Mathilde, and believes he can still smell her perfume wafting through the castle.
title: Le parfum de Mathilde
plot_es: Eva decides to do whatever she can to lift up the spirits of the master of the castle, Sir Remy, who is haunted by the death of his wife Mathilde, and believes he can still smell her perfume wafting through the castle.
plot_en: Eva decides to do whatever she can to lift up the spirits of the master of the castle, Sir Remy, who is haunted by the death of his wife Mathilde, and believes he can still smell her perfume wafting through the castle.
